chapters.title: Chapter 1: An Empty Road
chapters.info: Doral Barran was the Wisdom of Emond's Field. She is the oldest woman in Emond's Field, possibly in the entire Two Rivers. She is white-haired and frail, though still clear-eyed and not stooped at all. Her last apprentice died of a mysterious illness that she could not cure. She mentored Nynaeve al'Meara, who recently replaced her as Wisdom. See also al'Meara, Nynaeve.
